TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PerformanceCounterType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 为 实例指定用于计算 方法的公式。

span.span: Specifies the formula used to calculate the method for a instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 某些计数器类型表示的原始数据，而另一些则表示基于一个或多个计数器样本的计算的值。Some counter types represent raw data, while others represent calculated values that are based on one or more counter samples. 以下类别分类可用计数器的类型。The following categories classify the types of counters available. - **平均**:随着时间的推移测量值，并显示最后两个度量值的平均值。**Average**: Measures a value over time and displays the average of the last two measurements. 与每个平均计数器关联是基本计数器，它跟踪所涉及的样本数。Associated with each average counter is a base counter that tracks the number of samples involved. - **差异**:减去上次测量值与前一并显示的差异，如果它为正;如果为负数，它将显示零。**Difference**: Subtracts the last measurement from the previous one and displays the difference, if it is positive; if negative, it displays a zero. - **即时**:显示最新的度量。**Instantaneous**: Displays the most recent measurement. - **百分比**:显示为百分比的计算的值。**Percentage**: Displays calculated values as a percentage. - **速率**:随着时间的推移示例增加的事件计数，并更改的时间，以显示活动的速率变化中的计数值。**Rate**: Samples an increasing count of events over time and divides the change in count values by the change in time to display a rate of activity. 采样的性能计数器数据时在使用表示平均值的计数器类型，可以使原始数据值供你使用有意义。When sampling performance counter data, using a counter type that represents an average can make raw data values meaningful for your use. 例如，原始数据计数器`NumberOfItems64`可以公开的是相当随机示例示例数据。For example, the raw data counter `NumberOfItems64` can expose data that is fairly random from sample to sample. 用于计数器返回的值的平均计算公式为 (X 0 + X 1 +...+ X n) /n，其中每个 X i 都是原始计数器样本。The formula for an average calculation of the values that the counter returns would be (X 0 +X 1 +…+X n)/n, where each X i is a raw counter sample. 速率计数器是类似于平均计数器，但随着资源用于速率增加的情况下更有用。Rate counters are similar to average counters, but more useful for situations in which the rate increases as a resource is used. 快速计算平均值的公式是 ((X n X 0) / (n-T 0)) / 频率，其中每个 X i 是一个计数器样本，每个 T i 是获取相应的样本的时间。A formula that quickly calculates the average is ((X n -X 0)/(T n -T 0)) / frequency, where each X i is a counter sample and each T i is the time that the corresponding sample was taken. 结果是每秒的平均使用率。The result is the average usage per second. *Multitimer 计数器*从多个组件 （如处理器或磁盘） 的实例中收集数据。*Multitimer counters* collect data from more than one instance of a component, such as a processor or disk. *反向计数器*测量组件处于非活动状态的时间，并从该测量值推导活动时间。*Inverse counters* measure the time that a component is not active and derive the active time from that measurement. > [!NOTE] > 除非另行说明，否则时间基数为秒。Unless otherwise indicated, the time base is seconds. 时检测应用程序 （创建和编写自定义性能计数器），您可能要使用依赖于计算中使用的伴随的基本计数器的性能计数器类型。When instrumenting applications (creating and writing custom performance counters), you might be working with performance counter types that rely on an accompanying base counter that is used in the calculations. 基本计数器必须紧跟在其关联计数器应用程序使用的集合。The base counter must be immediately after its associated counter in the collection your application uses. 下表列出了其相应的性能计数器类型基本计数器类型。The following table lists the base counter types with their corresponding performance counter types. |基本计数器类型Base counter type|性能计数器类型Performance counter types| |-----------------------|-------------------------------| |`AverageBase`|`AverageTimer32`

`AverageCount64`| |`CounterMultiBase`|`CounterMultiTimer`

`CounterMultiTimerInverse`

`CounterMultiTimer100Ns`

`CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse`| |`RawBase`|`RawFraction`| |`SampleBase`|`SampleFraction`| 以下是一些表示计算所得的值的计数器使用的公式：The following are the formulas used by some of the counters that represent calculated values: - `AverageCount64`：(N1-N0) /(B1-B0)，其中 N 1 和 N 0 是性能计数器读数，B1 和 B0 是及其相应`AverageBase`值。`AverageCount64`: (N1 - N0)/(B1 - B0), where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings, and B1 and B0 are their corresponding `AverageBase` values. 因此，分子表示在采样间隔期间处理的项数的数字，分母表示在采样间隔期间完成的操作数目。Thus, the numerator represents the numbers of items processed during the sample interval, and the denominator represents the number of operations completed during the sample interval. - `AverageTimer32`: ((N1-N0) /F) /(B1-B0)，其中 N1 和 N0 是性能计数器读数，B1，B0 是及其相应`AverageBase`值和 F 是每秒的刻度数。`AverageTimer32`: ((N1 - N0)/F)/(B1 - B0), where N1 and N0 are performance counter readings, B1 and B0 are their corresponding `AverageBase` values, and F is the number of ticks per second. F 的值因式分解为方程式，以便可以以秒为单位显示结果。The value of F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. 因此，分子表示的计时周期计数在最后一个采样间隔期间的数字、 F 表示的刻度，频率，分母表示最后一个采样间隔期间完成的操作数目。Thus, the numerator represents the numbers of ticks counted during the last sample interval, F represents the frequency of the ticks, and the denominator represents the number of operations completed during the last sample interval. - `CounterDelta32`：N1-N0，其中 N1 和 N0 是性能计数器读数。`CounterDelta32`: N1 - N0, where N1 and N0 are performance counter readings. - `CounterDelta64`：N1-N0，其中 N1 和 N0 是性能计数器读数。`CounterDelta64`: N1 - N0, where N1 and N0 are performance counter readings. - `CounterMultiTimer`: ((N1-N0) / (D1-D0)) x 100 / B，其中 N1 和 N0 是性能计数器读数、 D1 和 D0 是系统性能计时器的滴答相应的时间读数和变量 B 表示受监视的组件的基本计数 （使用 ty 的基本计数器pe `CounterMultiBase`)。`CounterMultiTimer`: ((N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0)) x 100 / B, where N1 and N0 are performance counter readings, D1 and D0 are their corresponding time readings in ticks of the system performance timer, and the variable B denotes the base count for the monitored components (using a base counter of type `CounterMultiBase`). 因此，分子表示在采样间隔期间监视的组件处于活动状态，和分母表示取样时间间隔的总已用时间的部分。Thus, the numerator represents the portions of the sample interval during which the monitored components were active, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval. - `CounterMultiTimer100Ns`: ((N1-N0) / (D1-D0)) x 100 / B，其中 N1 和 N0 是性能计数器的读数，D1 和 D0 是以 100 毫微秒为单位，相应的时间读数和变量 B 表示受监视的组件的基本计数 (使用基类型的计数器的`CounterMultiBase`).`CounterMultiTimer100Ns`: ((N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0)) x 100 / B, where N1 and N0 are performance counter readings, D1 and D0 are their corresponding time readings in 100-nanosecond units, and the variable B denotes the base count for the monitored components (using a base counter of type `CounterMultiBase`). 因此，分子表示在采样间隔期间监视的组件处于活动状态，和分母表示取样时间间隔的总已用时间的部分。Thus, the numerator represents the portions of the sample interval during which the monitored components were active, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval. - `CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse`：(B-((N1-N0) / (D1-D0))) x 100，分母表示的采样间隔的总运行时间分子表示在间隔期间的时间时受监视的组件处于非活动状态，并且 B 表示受监视的组件数使用类型的基本计数器`CounterMultiBase`。`CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse`: (B - ((N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0))) x 100, where the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval, the numerator represents the time during the interval when monitored components were inactive, and B represents the number of components being monitored, using a base counter of type `CounterMultiBase`. - `CounterMultiTimerInverse`：(B-((N1-N0) / (D1-D0))) x 100，分母表示的采样间隔的总运行时间分子表示在间隔期间的时间时受监视的组件处于非活动状态，并且 B 表示受监视的组件数使用类型的基本计数器`CounterMultiBase`。`CounterMultiTimerInverse`: (B- ((N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0))) x 100, where the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval, the numerator represents the time during the interval when monitored components were inactive, and B represents the number of components being monitored, using a base counter of type `CounterMultiBase`. - `CounterTimer`：(N1-N0) / (D1-D0)，其中 N1 值，N0 将性能计数器读数，D1 和 D0 是从相应的时间读数。`CounterTimer`: (N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0), where N1 and N0 are performance counter readings, and D1 and D0 are their corresponding time readings. 因此，分子表示在采样间隔期间监视的组件处于活动状态，和分母表示取样时间间隔的总已用时间的部分。Thus, the numerator represents the portions of the sample interval during which the monitored components were active, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval. - `CounterTimerInverse`：(1-((N1-N0) / (D1-D0))) x 100，其中分子表示的时间间隔期间监视的组件处于非活动状态，分母表示取样时间间隔的总运行时间。`CounterTimerInverse`: (1- ((N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0))) x 100, where the numerator represents the time during the interval when the monitored components were inactive, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval. - `CountPerTimeInterval32`：(N1-N0) / (D1-D0)，其中分子表示队列中的项的数目，分母表示的时间的最后一个采样间隔期间运行。`CountPerTimeInterval32`: (N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0), where the numerator represents the number of items in the queue, and the denominator represents the time elapsed during the last sample interval. - `CountPerTimeInterval64`：(N1-N0) / (D1-D0)，其中分子表示队列中的项的数量，分母表示的时间在采样间隔期间的运行。`CountPerTimeInterval64`: (N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0), where the numerator represents the number of items in a queue and the denominator represents the time elapsed during the sample interval. - `ElapsedTime`：(D0-N0) / F，其中 D0 表示当前时间，N0 表示对象的启动的时间，并且 F 表示一秒内经过的时间单位数。`ElapsedTime`: (D0 - N0) / F, where D0 represents the current time, N0 represents the time the object was started, and F represents the number of time units that elapse in one second. F 的值因式分解为方程式，以便可以以秒为单位显示结果。The value of F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. - `NumberOfItems32`：无。`NumberOfItems32`: None. 不显示平均值，但它收集时显示的原始数据。Does not display an average, but shows the raw data as it is collected. - `NumberOfItems64`：无。`NumberOfItems64`: None. 不显示平均值，但它收集时显示的原始数据。Does not display an average, but shows the raw data as it is collected. - `NumberOfItemsHEX32`：无。`NumberOfItemsHEX32`: None. 不显示平均值，但它收集时显示的原始数据。Does not display an average, but shows the raw data as it is collected. - `NumberOfItemsHEX64`：无。`NumberOfItemsHEX64`: None. 不显示平均值，但它收集时显示的原始数据Does not display an average, but shows the raw data as it is collected - `RateOfCountsPerSecond32`：(N1-N0) / ((D1-D0) / F)，其中 N1 和 N0 是性能计数器的读数，D1 和 D0 是相应的时间读数，而 F 表示每秒的刻度数。`RateOfCountsPerSecond32`: (N1 - N0) / ((D1 - D0) / F), where N1 and N0 are performance counter readings, D1 and D0 are their corresponding time readings, and F represents the number of ticks per second. 因此，分子表示最后一个采样间隔，分母表示计时周期数的运行时间最后一个采样间隔期间执行的操作的数量，而 F 则是滴答频率。Thus, the numerator represents the number of operations performed during the last sample interval, the denominator represents the number of ticks elapsed during the last sample interval, and F is the frequency of the ticks. F 的值因式分解为方程式，以便可以以秒为单位显示结果。The value of F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. - `RateOfCountsPerSecond64`：(N1-N0) / ((D1-D0) / F)，其中 N1 和 N0 是性能计数器的读数，D1 和 D0 是相应的时间读数，而 F 表示每秒的刻度数。`RateOfCountsPerSecond64`: (N1 - N0) / ((D1 - D0) / F), where N1 and N0 are performance counter readings, D1 and D0 are their corresponding time readings, and F represents the number of ticks per second. 因此，分子表示最后一个采样间隔，分母表示计时周期数的运行时间最后一个采样间隔期间执行的操作的数量，而 F 则是滴答频率。Thus, the numerator represents the number of operations performed during the last sample interval, the denominator represents the number of ticks elapsed during the last sample interval, and F is the frequency of the ticks. F 的值因式分解为方程式，以便可以以秒为单位显示结果。The value of F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. - `RawFraction`：(N0 / D0) x 100，其中 D0 表示内已测量的特性 (使用基类型的计数器的`RawBase`) 和 N0 表示该特性的一个组件。`RawFraction`: (N0 / D0) x 100, where D0 represents a measured attribute (using a base counter of type `RawBase`) and N0 represents one component of that attribute. - `SampleCounter`：(N1-N0) / ((D1-D0) / F)，其中，分子 (N) 表示完成的操作数目、 分母 (D) 表示所花费的时间的系统性能计时器的滴答为单位，F 表示一秒内经过的计时周期数。`SampleCounter`: (N1 - N0) / ((D1 - D0) / F), where the numerator (N) represents the number of operations completed, the denominator (D) represents elapsed time in units of ticks of the system performance timer, and F represents the number of ticks that elapse in one second. F 因式分解为方程式，以便可以以秒为单位显示结果。F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. - `SampleFraction`: ((N1-N0) / (D1-D0)) x 100，其中分子在最后一个采样间隔期间表示成功的操作的数量，分母表示 （的测量的类型） 的所有操作的数量在采样间隔期间完成的更改，使用类型的计数器`SampleBase`。`SampleFraction`: ((N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0)) x 100, where the numerator represents the number of successful operations during the last sample interval, and the denominator represents the change in the number of all operations (of the type measured) completed during the sample interval, using counters of type `SampleBase`. - `Timer100Ns`：(N1-N0) / (D1-D0) x 100，其中分子表示在此期间监视的组件处于活动状态，在采样间隔中的部分，分母表示取样时间间隔的总运行时间。`Timer100Ns`: (N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0) x 100, where the numerator represents the portions of the sample interval during which the monitored components were active, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval. - `Timer100NsInverse`：(1-((N1-N0) / (D1-D0))) x 100，其中分子表示的时间间隔期间监视的组件处于非活动状态，分母表示取样时间间隔的总运行时间。`Timer100NsInverse`: (1- ((N1 - N0) / (D1 - D0))) x 100, where the numerator represents the time during the interval when the monitored components were inactive, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了几个中的计数器类型枚举。The following examples demonstrate several of the counter types in the enumeration. `AverageCount64` [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType AverageBase = int32(1073939458)
AverageBase = 1073939458

summary.span: 在时间或计数的平均值计算中使用的基本计数器（如 和 ）。

span.span: A base counter that is used in the calculation of time or count averages, such as and .

summary.span: 存储用于计算表示“每个操作的时间”或“每个操作的计数”的计数器的分母。

span.span: Stores the denominator for calculating a counter to present "time per operation" or "count per operation".

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType AverageCount64 = int32(1073874176)
AverageCount64 = 1073874176

summary.span: 平均计数器，它显示一次操作中平均处理的项数。

span.span: An average counter that shows how many items are processed, on average, during an operation.

summary.span: 这种类型的计数器显示已处理的项与已完成的操作数的比率。

span.span: Counters of this type display a ratio of the items processed to the number of operations completed.

summary.span: 计算该比率的方法是将上一个时间间隔内处理的项数与上一个时间间隔内完成的操作数进行比较

span.span: The ratio is calculated by comparing the number of items processed during the last interval to the number of operations completed during the last interval.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 PhysicalDisk\ Avg.Disk Bytes/Transfer。

span.span: Counters of this type include PhysicalDisk\ Avg. Disk Bytes/Transfer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType AverageTimer32 = int32(805438464)
AverageTimer32 = 805438464

summary.span: 平均计数器，它测量完成某个进程或操作平均所花费的时间。

span.span: An average counter that measures the time it takes, on average, to complete a process or operation.

summary.span: 这种类型的计数器显示采样时间间隔的总运行时间与该时间内完成的进程或操作数的比率。

span.span: Counters of this type display a ratio of the total elapsed time of the sample interval to the number of processes or operations completed during that time.

summary.span: 此计数器类型用系统时钟的滴答来测量时间

span.span: This counter type measures time in ticks of the system clock.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 PhysicalDisk\ Avg.Disk sec/Transfer。

span.span: Counters of this type include PhysicalDisk\ Avg. Disk sec/Transfer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterDelta32 = int32(4195328)
CounterDelta32 = 4195328

summary.span: 差异计数器，它显示在最近的两个采用间隔内已测量特性的更改。

span.span: A difference counter that shows the change in the measured attribute between the two most recent sample intervals.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterDelta64 = int32(4195584)
CounterDelta64 = 4195584

summary.span: 差异计数器，它显示在最近的两个采用间隔内已测量特性的更改。

span.span: A difference counter that shows the change in the measured attribute between the two most recent sample intervals.

summary.span: 它与 计数器类型相同，但它使用更大的字段来容纳较大的值。

span.span: It is the same as the counter type except that is uses larger fields to accomodate larger values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiBase = int32(1107494144)
CounterMultiBase = 1107494144

summary.span: 基本计数器，它指示已采用的项数。

span.span: A base counter that indicates the number of items sampled.

summary.span: 它在计算中用作分母，以在获取多个相似项的计时时间时获取已采用项的平均数。

span.span: It is used as the denominator in the calculations to get an average among the items sampled when taking timings of multiple, but similar items.

summary.span: 与 、、 和 一起使用。

span.span: Used with , , , and .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiTimer = int32(574686464)
CounterMultiTimer = 574686464

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它以采用间隔总时间百分比的形式显示一个或多个组件的活动时间。

span.span: A percentage counter that displays the active time of one or more components as a percentage of the total time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 由于分子记录的是同时操作的组件的活动时间，因此最终的百分比可以超过 100%。

span.span: Because the numerator records the active time of components operating simultaneously, the resulting percentage can exceed 100 percent.

summary.span: 此计数器类型与 的不同之处在于：它以系统性能计时器的滴答为单位（而不是以 100 毫微秒为单位）来测量时间

span.span: This counter type differs from in that it measures time in units of ticks of the system performance timer, rather than in 100 nanosecond units.

summary.span: 此计数器的类型是多项计时器。

span.span: This counter type is a multitimer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiTimer100Ns = int32(575735040)
CounterMultiTimer100Ns = 575735040

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它以采用间隔总时间百分比的形式显示一个或多个组件的活动时间。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the active time of one or more components as a percentage of the total time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 它以 100 毫微秒 (ns) 为单位来测量时间。

span.span: It measures time in 100 nanosecond (ns) units.

summary.span: 此计数器的类型是多项计时器。

span.span: This counter type is a multitimer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse = int32(592512256)
CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse = 592512256

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它以采用间隔总时间百分比的形式显示一个或多个组件的活动时间。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the active time of one or more components as a percentage of the total time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 这种类型的计数器以 100 毫微秒 (ns) 为单位来测量时间。

span.span: Counters of this type measure time in 100 nanosecond (ns) units.

summary.span: 它们推导活动时间的方法是测量组件处于非活动状态的时间，然后从受监视的对象数乘以 100% 中减去该结果。

span.span: They derive the active time by measuring the time that the components were not active and subtracting the result from multiplying 100 percent by the number of objects monitored.

summary.span: 此计数器类型为一个反向多项计时器。

span.span: This counter type is an inverse multitimer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiTimerInverse = int32(591463680)
CounterMultiTimerInverse = 591463680

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它以采用间隔总时间百分比的形式显示一个或多个组件的活动时间。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the active time of one or more components as a percentage of the total time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 它推导活动时间的方法是测量组件处于非活动状态的时间，然后从受监视的对象乘以 100% 中减去该结果。

span.span: It derives the active time by measuring the time that the components were not active and subtracting the result from 100 percent by the number of objects monitored.

summary.span: 此计数器类型为一个反向多项计时器。

span.span: This counter type is an inverse multitimer.

summary.span: 它与 `CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse` 的不同之处在于：它是以系统性能计时器的滴答为单位（而不是以 100 毫微秒为单位）来测量时间。

span.span: It differs from `CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse` in that it measures time in units of ticks of the system performance timer, rather than in 100 nanosecond units.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterTimer = int32(541132032)
CounterTimer = 541132032

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它以总采用时间的百分比形式显示组件处于活动状态的平均时间。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the average time that a component is active as a percentage of the total sample time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterTimerInverse = int32(557909248)
CounterTimerInverse = 557909248

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它显示在采用时间间隔内观测到的活动时间的平均百分比。

span.span: A percentage counter that displays the average percentage of active time observed during sample interval.

summary.span: 计算这些计数器值的方法是监视服务处于非活动状态的时间百分比，然后从 100% 中减去该值。

span.span: The value of these counters is calculated by monitoring the percentage of time that the service was inactive and then subtracting that value from 100 percent.

summary.span: 这是反向计数器类型。

span.span: This is an inverse counter type.

summary.span: 它与 `CounterTimer100NsInv` 相同，但它是以系统性能计时器的滴答为单位（而不是以 100 毫微秒为单位）来测量时间。

span.span: It is the same as `CounterTimer100NsInv`, except that it measures time in units of ticks of the system performance timer rather than in 100 nanosecond units.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CountPerTimeInterval32 = int32(4523008)
CountPerTimeInterval32 = 4523008

summary.span: 平均计数器，旨在监视一段时间内资源队列的平均长度。

span.span: An average counter designed to monitor the average length of a queue to a resource over time.

summary.span: 它显示在最近两个采用时间间隔内观测到的队列长度分别除以间隔时间后的差值。

span.span: It shows the difference between the queue lengths observed during the last two sample intervals divided by the duration of the interval.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器通常用于跟踪排队或等候的项数。

span.span: This type of counter is typically used to track the number of items that are queued or waiting.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CountPerTimeInterval64 = int32(4523264)
CountPerTimeInterval64 = 4523264

summary.span: 平均值计数器，它监视一段时间内资源队列的平均长度。

span.span: An average counter that monitors the average length of a queue to a resource over time.

summary.span: 这种类型的计数器显示在最近两个采用间隔内观测到的队列长度分别除以间隔时间后的差值。

span.span: Counters of this type display the difference between the queue lengths observed during the last two sample intervals, divided by the duration of the interval.

summary.span: 此计数器类型与 相同，但它使用更大的字段来容纳较大的值。

span.span: This counter type is the same as except that it uses larger fields to accommodate larger values.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器通常用于跟踪排队或等候的大量项。

span.span: This type of counter is typically used to track a high-volume or very large number of items that are queued or waiting.

summary.span: 差异计时器，它显示组件或进程的开始时间与该值的计算时间之间的总时间。

span.span: A difference timer that shows the total time between when the component or process started and the time when this value is calculated.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 System\ System Up Time。

span.span: Counters of this type include System\ System Up Time.

NumberOfItems32 = 65536

summary.span: 即时计数器，它显示最近观测到的值。

span.span: An instantaneous counter that shows the most recently observed value.

summary.span: 例如，用于维护项或操作的简单计数。

span.span: Used, for example, to maintain a simple count of items or operations.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 Memory\Available Bytes。

span.span: Counters of this type include Memory\Available Bytes.

summary.span: 即时计数器，它显示最近观测到的值。

span.span: An instantaneous counter that shows the most recently observed value.

summary.span: 例如，用于维护大量的项或操作的简单计数。

span.span: Used, for example, to maintain a simple count of a very large number of items or operations.

summary.span: 它与 相同，但它使用更大的字段来容纳较大的值。

span.span: It is the same as except that it uses larger fields to accommodate larger values.

summary.span: 例如，用于维护大量的项或操作的简单计数。

span.span: Used, for example, to maintain a simple count of a very large number of items or operations.

summary.span: 差异计数器，它显示在采用间隔的每一秒内完成的操作的平均数目。

span.span: A difference counter that shows the average number of operations completed during each second of the sample interval.

summary.span: 这种类型的计数器用系统时钟的滴答 (Tick) 来测量时间

span.span: Counters of this type measure time in ticks of the system clock.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 System\ File Read Operations/sec。

span.span: Counters of this type include System\ File Read Operations/sec.

RateOfCountsPerSecond64 = 272696576

summary.span: 差异计数器，它显示在采用间隔的每一秒内完成的操作的平均数目。

span.span: A difference counter that shows the average number of operations completed during each second of the sample interval.

summary.span: 这种类型的计数器用系统时钟的滴答 (Tick) 来测量时间

span.span: Counters of this type measure time in ticks of the system clock.

summary.span: 此计数器类型与 类型相同，但它使用更大的字段来容纳较大的值，以跟踪每秒内的大量项数或操作数（如字节传输速率）。

span.span: This counter type is the same as the type, but it uses larger fields to accommodate larger values to track a high-volume number of items or operations per second, such as a byte-transmission rate.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 System\ File Read Bytes/sec。

span.span: Counters of this type include System\ File Read Bytes/sec.

summary.span: 基本计数器，它存储表示常规算术分数的计数器的分母。

span.span: A base counter that stores the denominator of a counter that presents a general arithmetic fraction.

summary.span: 检查以确保此值大于零，然后将它用作 值计算中的分母。

span.span: Check that this value is greater than zero before using it as the denominator in a value calculation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType RawFraction = int32(537003008)
RawFraction = 537003008

summary.span: 即时百分比计数器，它以百分比的形式显示子集与其父集的比率。

span.span: An instantaneous percentage counter that shows the ratio of a subset to its set as a percentage.

summary.span: 例如，它将磁盘上使用的字节数与该磁盘上的总字节数进行比较。

span.span: For example, it compares the number of bytes in use on a disk to the total number of bytes on the disk.

summary.span: 这种类型的计数器只显示当前百分比，而不显示一段时间的平均值。

span.span: Counters of this type display the current percentage only, not an average over time.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 Paging File\\% Usage Peak。

span.span: Counters of this type include Paging File\\% Usage Peak.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType SampleBase = int32(1073939457)
SampleBase = 1073939457

summary.span: 基本计数器，它存储获取的采用中断数，并在样本分数中用作分母。

span.span: A base counter that stores the number of sampling interrupts taken and is used as a denominator in the sampling fraction.

summary.span: 样本分数是采用中断的值为 1（或 ）的样本数。

span.span: The sampling fraction is the number of samples that were 1 (or ) for a sample interrupt.

summary.span: 检查以确保此值大于零，然后再将它用作 计算中的分母。

span.span: Check that this value is greater than zero before using it as the denominator in a calculation of .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType SampleCounter = int32(4260864)
SampleCounter = 4260864

summary.span: 平均计数器，它显示一秒内完成的平均操作数。

span.span: An average counter that shows the average number of operations completed in one second.

summary.span: 当这种类型的计数器对数据进行采用时，每个采用中断返回一或零。

span.span: When a counter of this type samples the data, each sampling interrupt returns one or zero.

summary.span: 该计数器数据是采用的个数。

span.span: The counter data is the number of ones that were sampled.

summary.span: 它以系统性能计时器的滴答为单位来测量时间。

span.span: It measures time in units of ticks of the system performance timer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType SampleFraction = int32(549585920)
SampleFraction = 549585920

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它显示最近两个采用时间间隔内的命中与所有操作的平均比率。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the average ratio of hits to all operations during the last two sample intervals.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 Cache\Pin Read Hits %。

span.span: Counters of this type include Cache\Pin Read Hits %.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType Timer100Ns = int32(542180608)

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它以采用时间间隔的总运行时间的百分比形式显示组件的活动时间。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the active time of a component as a percentage of the total elapsed time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 它以 100 毫微秒 (ns) 为单位来测量时间。

span.span: It measures time in units of 100 nanoseconds (ns).

summary.span: 这种类型的计数器旨在一次测量一个组件的活动

span.span: Counters of this type are designed to measure the activity of one component at a time.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 Processor\ % User Time。

span.span: Counters of this type include Processor\ % User Time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType Timer100NsInverse = int32(558957824)
Timer100NsInverse = 558957824

summary.span: 百分比计数器，它显示采用时间间隔内观测到的活动时间的平均百分比。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the average percentage of active time observed during the sample interval.

summary.span: 这是反向计数器。

span.span: This is an inverse counter.

summary.span: 此类型的计数器包括 Processor\ % Processor Time。

span.span: Counters of this type include Processor\ % Processor Time.
